name: Our Garden
description:
Our Garden exists as a project on hold. By the end of the first day of the Extra Credits game jam, the current progress made me feel sick. I woke up the second day realizing that the solution was to start from the ground up and redesign the game, keeping the original story and art style.

This was not going to happen, and I instead joined two friends in finishing their project. Our Garden will continue development, and will get a reupload within the next week and a half. Please enjoy this broken and unfinished game :)
